operationName.name: ConsultarRegistrosOrdenParam
operationName.stringSQL: SELECT rec.t$pdno ORDEN, rec.t$pono POSICION, rec.t$cwar ALMACEN, rec.t$clot LOTE, rec.t$sitm ARTICULO, " + art.t$dsca DESCRIPCION, art.t$cuni UNIDAD, rec.t$ques CANT_EST, rec.t$qucs ACT_CANT, " + rec.t$iswh ISS_WAREH, ibd200.t$oqmf FACTOR, art.t$kltc LOTE, rec.ROWID ID " + FROM " + owner + ".tticst001" + env + " rec INNER JOIN " + owner + ".ttcibd001" + env + " art ON rec.t$sitm = art.t$item INNER JOIN " + owner + ".ttcibd200" + env + " ibd200 ON art.t$item = ibd200.t$item INNER JOIN " + owner + ".ttisfc001" + env + " sfc ON rec.t$pdno = sfc.t$pdno " + WHERE sfc.t$osta in('5','7','9') AND rec.t$nnts = 1 AND rec.t$qucs > 0 " + AND TRIM(rec.t$pdno)='{0}'";

operationName.name: insertarRegistro
operationName.stringSQL: "INSERT INTO " + <%# Eval("tabla") %> + "(T$ORNO, T$PONO, T$ITEM, T$CWAR, T$QUNE, T$LOGN, T$DATE, T$PROC, "+ "T$REFCNTD, T$REFCNTU,T$CLOT)" + "VALUES(:T$ORNO, :T$PONO, :T$ITEM, :T$CWAR, :T$QUNE, :T$LOGN, sysdate+(5/24) ," + ":T$PROC, :T$REFCNTD, :T$REFCNTU, :T$CLOT)"
